duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute work and assist in the growth of the regional public and industrial sector water business and client base.
Direct and manage engineers and/or technicians on projects.
Prepare bid documents, reports, calculations, and project deliverables and reviewing the design of others.

Work in a project manager role with responsibility for successful delivery of the project and client satisfaction (schedule, financial, and quality) for water wastewater planning, design and or construction phase services.

Develop statement of qualifications, detailed proposals and contracts to include project understanding, scope of work, pricing, schedule, and other terms and conditions; and follow through with development/implementation of a project execution plan.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Civil or Environmental Engineering, Master’s Degree in Engineering preferred. Colorado Professional Engineer (PE) License required or ability to obtain.
